io.craigmiller160.school.service

Class SchoolDataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.craigmiller160.school.service.SchoolDataService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericEntityService, GenericEntityServiceBean, GenericJoinHolderService, GenericPaginatedEntityService, GenericPaginatedJoinHolderService

    @Component(value="schoolService")
public class SchoolDataService
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericEntityServiceBean
    Default implementation of the SchoolService interface. Accepts DAO objects for the Student and Course entities and the ScJoinHolder entity that they're joined to, with logic to perform the necessary operations for all three via the generic methods.

    THREAD SAFETY: This class is thread-safe. Its only state is contained in the DAO fields, which are final and cannot be changed after instantiation.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    craig

      • createEntity

        public <T> T createEntity(java.lang.Class<T> entityType,
                          java.lang.Object... params)
        Convenience class for creating new instances of entities and inserting them into the database. This method will return an entity of the specified type, with values set to whatever fields are provided in the varargs params argument.

        NOTE: For the varargs params argument, the order of the arguments must match a constructor of the entity to be created. Not specifying all values is permitted, but the order must be maintained with null placeholder values.

        NOTE: This implementation of this method does NOT support creating the ScJoinHolder entity. That is handled by the separate joinEntities(Class,Object...) method.

        Specified by:
        createEntity in interface GenericEntityService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of entity to create.
        Parameters:
        entityType - the type of entity to create.
        params - the values to set to the entity's fields.
        Returns:
        the created entity, having already been inserted into the database.

      • insertEntity

        public <T> void insertEntity(T entity)
        Description copied from interface: GenericEntityService
        Insert the entity into the database. This is to be used with an entity that has not already been added, and an exception may be thrown if called on an entity that already exists.
        Specified by:
        insertEntity in interface GenericEntityService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of entity to insert.
        Parameters:

                                                                 java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                                                                 int entityId)
        Description copied from interface: GenericJoinHolderService
        Get all JoinHolder entities that hold the entity specified by the provided type and unique ID. If the specified JoinHolder type isn't appropriate for the provided entities, an exception is thrown.
        Specified by:
        getAllJoinsFor in interface GenericJoinHolderService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of JoinHolder to use.
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinHolderType - the type of JoinHolder the entity is joined with.
        joinedEntityType - the type of entity to get joins for.
        entityId - the unique ID of the entity to get joins for.
        Returns:
        all JoinHolder entities that hold the entity specified.

      • getEntitiesByPage

        public <T> java.util.List<T> getEntitiesByPage(java.lang.Class<T> entityType,
                                               int pageNumber,
                                               int pageRowCount)
        Description copied from interface: GenericPaginatedEntityService
        Get a "page" of of entities from the database, essentially a sub-list of records from the database. The size of a page is defined by the last parameter (pageRowCount). The records to select are calculated by the pageNumber parameter, which is multiplied by the pageRowCount to find the section in the table to retrieve records for.
        Specified by:
        getEntitiesByPage in interface GenericPaginatedEntityService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of entity to get by page.
        Parameters:
        entityType - the type of entity to retrieve records of.
        pageNumber - the page to retrieve, based on breaking up the number of records in the table into "pages" with the number of rows defined in pageRowCount.
        pageRowCount - the number of rows on each page.
        Returns:
        a sub-list of entities from the table that is a "page" of data, based on the supplied parameters.

      • getEntitiesByPageFor

        public <T extends JoinHolder,U> java.util.List<T> getEntitiesByPageFor(java.lang.Class<T> joinHolderType,
                                                                       java.lang.Class<U> joinedEntityType,
                                                                       int entityId,
                                                                       int pageNumber,
                                                                       int pageRowCount)
        Description copied from interface: GenericPaginatedJoinHolderService
        Get a "page" of JoinHolder entities that are joined with the entity whose type and unique ID are specified in the parameters. The size of a page is defined by the last parameter (pageRowCount). The records to select are calculated by the pageNumber parameter, which is multiplied by the pageRowCount to find the section in the table to retrieve records for.
        Specified by:
        getEntitiesByPageFor in interface GenericPaginatedJoinHolderService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of JoinHolder to use.
        U - the type of entity that is joined.
        Parameters:
        joinHolderType - the type of JoinHolder the specified entity is linked to.
        joinedEntityType - the type of the entity to get the joins for.
        entityId - the unique ID of the entity to get the joins for.
        pageNumber - the page to retrieve, based on breaking up the number of records in the table into "pages" with the number of rows defined in pageRowCount.
        pageRowCount - the number of rows on each page.
        Returns:
        a sub-list of entities from the table that is a "page" of data, based on the supplied parameters.
